title: Sell Yoichi Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Nikka Yoichi Whisky | 10, 12, 15, 20 Year Old | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your rare Nikka Yoichi whisky. We buy discontinued age statements (10, 12, 15, 20) and single cask releases.
heroSubhead: Buying discontinued Yoichi age statements and single casks.
introParagraph: Nikka's Yoichi distillery produces bold, peat-influenced whisky in the style of Scotch. The discontinued age-statement bottles are some of the fastest-appreciating assets in the market.
whatWeBuy: Yoichi Limited Editions (Manzanilla, Moscatel, Rum Wood)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Common 'Single Malt Yoichi' NAS (No Age Statement) unless in bulk
conditionFactors: Discontinued Status: Age statements were discontinued in 2015, making condition vital
Box: 15 and 20 year often came in presentation boxes which add value
Label Stains: The white labels are prone to staining
Cap Seal: Check for cracks in the plastic wrapper
pricingFactors: Age Statement: The 15 and 20 Year are high-value collector items
Single Cask: Cask strength single casks command premium prices based on vintage
Wood Finish: Limited wood finishes (Rum, Sherry etc) are niche but valuable
Volume: 500ml variants (common in Japan) trade lower than 700/750ml

faqs.question: Is my Yoichi 'NAS' valuable?
faqs.answer: The standard No Age Statement Yoichi available today is common. We buy it, but for a lower price.

faqs.question: What about the 500ml bottles?
faqs.answer: We buy them, but the offer is adjusted for the smaller volume.

faqs.question: Do you buy 'Wood Finish' editions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for Yoichi Rum Wood, Sherry Wood, and Bourbon Wood finishes.

faqs.question: Why is the 20 Year so expensive?
faqs.answer: It was discontinued years ago and stocks are extremely low globally.

faqs.question: Do I need the original box?
faqs.answer: For vintage and age-statement bottles, yes, the box adds significant value.

faqs.question: Do you buy 'Nikka From the Barrel'?
faqs.answer: Generally only in bulk cases, as individual bottles are lower value.
